services.label: 360 Photo Booth
services.title: 360 Photo Booth
services.shortDescription: A modern platform where guests can record dynamic, slow-motion videos with a rotating camera.
services.longDescription: Our most popular service! Guests stand on a platform while a camera circles them, creating amazing slow-motion, 360-degree videos perfect for sharing on social media.
qualifiers: How many hours do you need?
Is this for a corporate or private event?

services.label: Magic Mirror
services.title: Magic Mirror
services.shortDescription: An interactive, full-length mirror that takes amazing selfies with fun animations.
services.longDescription: A fun, interactive, full-length mirror that takes high-quality selfies. Guests can sign their photos and add emojis right on the screen.
qualifiers: Do you require a custom welcome screen?
Will the event be indoors or outdoors?

services.label: Photo Booth Printer
services.title: Photo Booth Printer
services.shortDescription: Receive glossy, high-quality photo strips instantly with custom logos and designs.
services.longDescription: Get high-quality, glossy photo prints in seconds. We can customize them with your event logo or a special message.
qualifiers: How many copies per session do you need?
Do you have a logo for the print design?

services.label: La Hora Loca with LED Robot
services.title: La Hora Loca with LED Robot
services.shortDescription: An epic hour of high-energy entertainment with a giant LED robot, dancers, and CO2 jets.
services.longDescription: An unforgettable hour of high-energy fun, featuring a giant dancing LED robot, samba dancers, and tons of party props to get everyone on the dance floor.
qualifiers: What is the ceiling height of your venue?
Do you have any specific music requests for the robot's performance?

services.label: Cold Sparklers
services.title: Cold Sparklers
services.shortDescription: Create a stunning, safe pyrotechnic-like effect for magical moments without heat or smoke.
services.longDescription: Create a stunning, magical moment for grand entrances or first dances with our completely safe indoor sparkler fountains. They produce no smoke or heat.
qualifiers: How many machines do you envision for your moment?
Will this be for an entrance, first dance, or another moment?

services.label: Dance on the Clouds
services.title: Dance on the Clouds
services.shortDescription: A dreamy, thick cloud effect that covers the dance floor for a fairy-tale first dance.
services.longDescription: A beautiful, low-lying cloud of dry ice that covers the dance floor, creating a dreamy "dancing on clouds" effect for a romantic first dance.
qualifiers: What is the size of the dance floor?
Is the venue well-ventilated?

services.label: LED Tunnel & Neon Tube Installations
services.title: LED Tunnel & Neon Tubes
services.shortDescription: Create a futuristic entrance or photo backdrop with dynamic, colorful neon tube arches.
services.longDescription: It’s a modular neon-tube tunnel for entrances or photo backdrops with dynamic colors. Is this for a walkway or backdrop, and roughly what space do you have?
qualifiers: Is this for a walkway or backdrop?
Approximately what dimensions do you need?

services.label: LED Screen Walls (Video Wall)
services.title: LED Screen Wall
services.shortDescription: A massive LED screen wall for vibrant visuals, animations, and a futuristic event look.
services.longDescription: We build seamless LED walls and handle playback. What will you show (videos, logos, live) and what’s the event date and venue city?
qualifiers: What kind of content will you be displaying?
What size wall are you considering?

services.label: High-Quality Projector & Screen
services.title: Projector (Slideshows & Videos)
services.shortDescription: Display slideshows and videos on a large screen for an emotional and personal touch.
services.longDescription: Display slideshows and videos on a large screen for an emotional and personal touch. We offer high-definition projectors and screens for displaying photo slideshows, videos, or presentations.
qualifiers: What size screen do you need?
Will you provide the content to display?

services.label: Custom Monogram Projector
services.title: Monogram Projector
services.shortDescription: Project a custom, glowing monogram of initials or designs onto the dance floor or wall.
services.longDescription: Project a custom, glowing monogram of initials or designs onto the dance floor or wall for an elegant, personalized touch.
qualifiers: Do you have a design for the monogram?
Where would you like to project it?

services.label: Champagne Dress Hostess
services.title: Champagne Dress Hostess
services.shortDescription: A glamorous hostess serves champagne from an elegant dress-like structure, wowing your guests upon arrival.
services.longDescription: Absolutely—our Champagne Dress Hostess welcomes guests with pre-set flutes and can match your theme. Could I grab your date and city/ZIP to confirm availability?
qualifiers: How many guests are you expecting?
Is there a specific theme or color scheme for her attire?

services.label: Welcome Bridgerton Style
services.title: Welcome Bridgerton Style
services.shortDescription: Two elegantly dressed models greet your guests with sophistication and period-drama flair.
services.longDescription: Transport your guests to a world of romance and elegance with our Bridgerton-style welcome, featuring two models in exquisite period costumes.
qualifiers: Is there a specific color palette we should adhere to?
Will this be for an indoor or outdoor reception area?

services.label: Two Carnival Stilt Walkers
services.title: Carnival Stilt Walkers
services.shortDescription: Towering performers in vibrant costumes add a carnival atmosphere to your event.
services.longDescription: Add a touch of carnival spectacle with our professional stilt walkers, who interact with guests and bring life to the party.
qualifiers: Is your event indoors or outdoors?
Do you have a specific theme for their costumes?

services.label: Hora Loca Deluxe
services.title: Hora Loca Deluxe
services.shortDescription: Our ultimate party package with dancers, stilt walkers, CO2, glow sticks, and more.
services.longDescription: The complete Hora Loca experience! This package includes multiple dancers, a stilt walker, a CO2 cannon, and tons of props like glow sticks and hats to create an electrifying party hour.
qualifiers: How many guests are you expecting?
Is there a specific theme for the event?

services.label: Big-Head Characters / Extra Dancers
services.title: Big-Head Characters
services.shortDescription: Surprise your guests with fun, oversized character heads of celebrities or custom designs.
services.longDescription: Add a hilarious and unique photo opportunity with our big-head characters. Choose from popular figures or request a custom design to match your theme.
qualifiers: Which characters are you interested in?
Would you like to add extra dancers to accompany them?

services.label: Snow Effect
services.title: Snow Effect
services.shortDescription: Create a magical winter wonderland with our safe, realistic artificial snow effect.
services.longDescription: Perfect for winter-themed parties or a magical first dance, our professional snow machines create a beautiful, realistic snowfall effect that dissolves without a mess.
qualifiers: Will this be used indoors or outdoors?
How long do you need the effect to last?
